name: Adrienne Moore
description: I am a very cool headed,honest,open minded,loving and caring woman. I like to smile a lot because I always like to put smiles on my face as much as possible because I believe life is about happiness and joy. I dont like arguing or fighting because I want to live happy peaceful life and enjoy it to the fullest. I want a man whom would be true to me and to himself. I am after a love that will give me a reason to breathe. I want a future husband in my life, someone to hold, confide in, laugh with, cry with, someone I can watch soccer with, fish with, walk along the beach at night with. I want it. I deserve it, as do you. I sincerely hope that you feel the same as I do about you. I like listening to music,watching movies, watching sports and i like going to beach
